title: Philippe Coutinho: I’m ready to become a Liverpool legend
text:
He wants to win titles with the club (Picture: AFP/Getty Images) Philippe Coutinho this week committed his long-term future to Liverpool , by signing a new five-year deal with the club.
The Brazilian put an end to the speculation linking him with a move to Barcelona by putting pen to paper, much to the delight of the Kop faithful.

‘I understand what Liverpool means. We can say Dalglish, Rush, Hansen, Souness, Suarez, Gerrard. I’ve been here quite a few years already, it’s not like I am new. I understand.
‘To have signed a new contract at this club, my goal is to be thought of one day in the same way as these players. They are legends.
‘You define the success of a player by his loyalty or his titles. Or both. In order to be part of this group, I have so much to do.
‘I want to win titles. Five years is my new contract . . . it gives me that opportunity.’
